name: Data-Driven Decisions
description: Welcome to "Data-Driven Decisions", a marketing podcast hosted by Zontee Hou that looks at the lessons that leaders can take from data to inform the best marketing practices and internal culture. As author of Data-Driven Personalization, Zontee discusses some of the key insights from the book and sits down with marketing experts from a variety of industries.
